name: Avishek
message:
✅ Option 1 (Best): Use your computer’s LAN IP address

Make sure PC and mobile are on the same Wi-Fi

Find your computer’s local IP:

Windows: ipconfig → look for IPv4 Address

Mac/Linux: ifconfig or ip a

Start your local server (example: port 3000)

On your mobile browser, open:

http://YOUR_PC_IP:3000


Example:

http://192.168.1.10:3000


✅ This works for most dev servers (React, Node, Python, etc.)

✅ Option 2: Bind your server to all interfaces (0.0.0.0)

Some frameworks only listen on localhost by default, so mobile can't access it.

Use one of these:

React / Vite
